title: Petition for In-State Residency
description: A student who was previously classified as out-of-state believes they now qualify for in-state tuition.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their current residency status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student is currently 'Out-of-State'.

tasks.description: Explain the requirements for establishing in-state residency for tuition purposes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the state's legal requirements (e.g., 12 months of residency, proof of intent).

tasks.description: Provide the student with the residency petition form and a list of required supporting documents (e.g., lease, driver's license, tax returns).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the student with all necessary forms and information.
